sentences.en: Every form of deception and every obstacle baffled the Allied Commission.
sentences.cn: 用尽一切欺瞒和阻挠的手段来避开协约国委员会的耳目.

sentences.en: He is in the full flush of success ; nothing was an obstacle .
sentences.cn: 他的成就如日中天, 锐不可当.

sentences.en: He put every obstacle in my way.
sentences.cn: 他处处从中作梗.

sentences.en: He took a leap over an obstacle.
sentences.cn: 他跃过障碍物.

sentences.en: He took every obstacle in his stride.
sentences.cn: 他轻易地度过一切难关.

sentences.en: Her parents'opposition is an obstacle to her marriage.
sentences.cn: 她父母的反对是她结婚的障碍.

sentences.en: It was an obstacle that no one could avoid for ever.
sentences.cn: 谁也不能永远逃避这一关.

sentences.en: Most competition cars will only roll over if they hit an obstacle.
sentences.cn: 大多数赛车只有在撞上障碍物时才会翻车。

sentences.en: Overcrowding remains a large obstacle to improving conditions.
sentences.cn: 过分拥挤仍然是改善环境的一大障碍。

sentences.en: She felt that her family was an obstacle to her work.
sentences.cn: 她感到她的家庭妨碍她的工作.

sentences.en: The Church of England put a serious obstacle in the path of women who want to become priests.
sentences.cn: 英国国教在妇女成为牧师的道路上设置了重大障碍。

sentences.en: The difference in regional house prices acts as an obstacle to mobility of labour.
sentences.cn: 不同地区房价的差异阻碍了劳动力的流动.

sentences.en: The fallen tree lying across the road is an obstacle.
sentences.cn: 横在大路上一棵倒下的树是障碍.

sentences.en: the single biggest obstacle to a Conservative victory in the next election
sentences.cn: 保守党在下一届大选中获胜的最大障碍

sentences.en: The tax puts obstacles in the way of companies trying to develop trade overseas.
sentences.cn: 这项税收为想在海外发展贸易的公司设置了障碍。

sentences.en: There are formidable obstacles on the road to peace.
sentences.cn: 通往和平的道路上存在难以逾越的障碍。

sentences.en: They constituted a near - insuperable obstacle to the besieging infantry.
sentences.cn: 它们就会形成围城步兵几乎不可逾越的障碍.

sentences.en: This should not present an obstacle to the development of good relations between our two countries.
sentences.cn: 这不应妨碍我们两国之间良好关系的发展.

sentences.en: We want to remove all obstacles to travel between the two countries.
sentences.cn: 我们想要消除在这两个国家之间旅行的所有障碍。

sentences.en: Women still have to overcome many obstacles to gain equality.
sentences.cn: 妇女要获得平等仍需克服重重障碍。

trans.tran_cn: 障碍（物），障碍物（绊脚石，障碍栅栏）
trans.tran_en: something that makes it difficult to achieve some­thing
